definition: knee/(Internet slang) to kneel down (in admiration)
at the knee (in reference to children)/(salutation used in letters to parents or grandparents)
lit. knees pressed close/intimate/seated side by side/in close contact
to sit side-by-side and have a heart-to-heart talk (idiom)
level with one's knees/knee-length (skirt etc)/knee-deep (mud etc)
to bow and bend the knee (idiom); fawning/bending and scraping to curry favor
Achyranthes bidentata (root used in Chinese medicine)
servile and bending the knee (idiom); fawning/bending and scraping to curry favor
lit. the man has gold under his knees; fig. a man who does not easily kneel in front of others (owing to pride or moral integrity)
pinyin: nan2 ren2 xi1 xia4 you3 huang2 jin1

sentences.english: Bend at the knee when you ski downhill.
sentences.chinese: 你从山上往下滑雪时，要屈着膝。

sentences.english: Why not just start with the $100 or $500 lap dance?
sentences.chinese: 为什么不先从100或500美元的膝舞起售呢？

sentences.english: Maintain knee and toe alignment to prevent knee torquing .
sentences.chinese: 维持膝和脚趾对准阻止膝转力矩。

sentences.english: Excision of semilunar cartilage of knee joint.
sentences.chinese: 膝闭节半月硬骨切除术。

sentences.english: Father Fauvent, you will get another knee-cap with a bell.
sentences.chinese: 割爷，您再准备一副有铃铛的膝带。

sentences.english: The author has made IR and UV spectroscopic assay of cyathula and its counterfeit.
sentences.chinese: 膝及其伪品进行了IR光谱及UV导数光谱的测定。

sentences.english: I begged them on my knees not to go into this chapter, he said.
sentences.chinese: 我在我的膝上请求他们不要再进入这章，他说。

sentences.english: Rose was on my lap. The rabbit had disappeared.
sentences.chinese: 罗丝坐在我的膝上，兔宝宝已经不见了。

sentences.english: The mother was dancing the baby on her knee.
sentences.chinese: 那位母亲在膝上上下舞弄逗乐婴儿。

sentences.english: Mrs Heathcliff was seated by the bedside, with her hands folded on her knees.
sentences.chinese: 希刺克厉夫夫人坐在床边，手抱着膝。
冰镐安全抱膝客场插槽。

sentences.english: With time elapsing, the flaps collapse up on his clapper' s lap.
sentences.chinese: 随着时光流逝，袋盖在拍手者的膝上堆叠起来。

sentences.english: Yet Ms. Wells has also rejected the below-the-knee skirts and neat matching sweaters suggested by her mother.
sentences.chinese: 但韦尔斯也拒绝母亲提议的及膝裙和配套的毛衫。

sentences.english: I shall roll on and on, and break upon your lap with laugher.
sentences.chinese: 我奔腾前进，大笑着撞碎在你的膝上。

sentences.english: My left knee is not causing me any problems.
sentences.chinese: 我的左膝并没有给我带来任何麻烦。

definition: knee/(Internet slang) to kneel down (in admiration)
to land/to touch the ground/also pr. [zhuo2 di4]
to sit cross-legged/to sit in the lotus position
(gymnastics) to do a bridge/to do a crab
to draw together/to place side by side (e.g. one's fingers, two halves of a torn sheet of paper etc)
to bow/to bend at the waist
